title: Input/Output Lotto
description: Create a program that asks the user for their name, age, and favorite hobby. The program should then output a customized message that includes the user's name, age, and hobby, and also generates a random lottery number between 1 and 100. The output message should be in the format: 'Hello, {name}! You are {age} years old and enjoy {hobby}. Your lucky lottery number is: {lotto_number}'.
sample_output: Hello, John Doe! You are 25 years old and enjoy Reading. Your lucky lottery number is: 43
